summary: This document is a series of official count sheets and an inmate roster from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated August 7, 2019. It records inmate counts by housing unit and includes a roster entry for inmate 'MERSEY' (likely Jeffrey Epstein, using an alias or misspelling), who is listed under a suicide watch assignment. The documents are routine prison administrative records from the day Epstein was found deceased.

persons.name: MERSEY
persons.context: Listed on the inmate roster with registration number 89673-053, assigned to a hospital/suicide watch on August 7, 2019. This is almost certainly a reference to Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Prison Count and Suicide Watch Assignment
events.description: Routine inmate counts were conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center. Inmate 'MERSEY' (Jeffrey Epstein) was listed on the roster with an assignment to hospital/suicide watch.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: The documents are dated August 7, 2019, the day Jeffrey Epstein was found dead in his cell.
An inmate roster lists 'MERSEY' (reg. 89673-053) with an assignment to 'HOSP' and 'SUICIDE OR G0000', indicating he was on suicide watch.
The documents show standard prison administrative procedures, including unit-by-unit inmate counts and an out-count form.
The inmate 'MERSEY' is almost certainly Jeffrey Epstein, using an alias or a misspelled entry in the prison system.
